name: Assault Barrage
description:
Assault Barrage is a bullet hell prototype with a single level. Due to the singular level, the difficulty (while not ridiculously challenging) has been scaled up to take quite a few attempts. 

Everything in this game was created by me over the course of 3 days. The only thing that wasn't created by me was the public domain background image. (Note: This game does not use any sound). 

Instructions:
In order to die, your blue core must be hit by a bullet or your green shell must make contact with the enemy. However, if your green shell is hit by a bullet, your graze counter will go up and you will continue playing. 

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space or Enter to select a button (menus only)
